Package de.lmu.ifi.dbs.elki.workflow

Work flow packages, e.g. following the usual KDD model, closely related to CRISP-DM

See:
          Description


Interface Summary
WorkflowStep Trivial interface for workflow steps.
 

Class Summary
AlgorithmStep The "algorithms" step, where data is analyzed.
AlgorithmStep.Parameterizer Parameterization class.
EvaluationStep The "evaluation" step, where data is analyzed.
EvaluationStep.Parameterizer Parameterization class.
InputStep Data input step of the workflow.
InputStep.Parameterizer Parameterization class.
LoggingStep Pseudo-step to configure logging / verbose mode.
LoggingStep.Parameterizer Parameterization class.
OutputStep The "output" step, where data is analyzed.
OutputStep.Parameterizer Parameterization class.
 

Package de.lmu.ifi.dbs.elki.workflow Description

Work flow packages, e.g. following the usual KDD model, closely related to CRISP-DM
